verbs.description: rules for [ARG0: new az bill] [V: allowing] people [ARG1: to smash car windows to save dogs kids] arizona joins 16 other states with a new bill that allows citizens to break a car window in order to rescue a child or pet hb 2494 essentially provides immunity from being sued over damages for arizona humane society bretta nelson marcy jones
